name: Angel In Training
description:
A game built in the Gamemaker engine, Angel In Training follows another sector of the organization known as the Sentinels; the Radio Corps.  The player is a new hire tasked with raising a newly-created angel for service in the Sentinel communication network; drafting a training plan, fostering a bond with their charge, and coordinating communications with other agents in the field.

By day, you bond with your angel and help it grow. By night, you both do your duty to the organization you work for. And at the end of the week, you will see the results of all of your hard work, one way or another.

The audio for this project was provided by these lovely people!

  • The Conet Project-mib
  • Koops at Freesound-Page Turn
  • Justinbw at Freesound- Power On
  • Cubilon at Freesound- Cat Purring
  • Mickleness at Freesound- Game Win
  • Joano Janz at Freesound- Finger Tap
  • Inspector J at Freesound- Bike Bell Ding
  • Nox Sound at Freesound- Object Drawer Wood Close
  • Joviansounds at Freesound- Radio Sign Off Squelch
  • Komicguy35 at Freesound- Write
  • J1987 at Freesound- Book Snap Shut
  • Mixkit-All of the angel sounds not listed above + Typewriter Sounds
  • Geographer at YT Song Library- Away, Float, Computer Bounce
  • pATCHES at YT Song Library-Hard To Let Go of Grammar
  • Godmode ar YT Song Library-Whole Tone Limbo
